name: MLSDev
tagline: World-class mobile and web development agency
description:
We create awesome web and mobile apps for businesses, entrepreneurs, and startups.
 
MLSDev specializes in providing all-in-one solutions in web and mobile development. We follow agile methodologies and always improve our processes to deliver the best results to our customers from all over the world.
 
Our mission is to maximally unlock the potential of our clients’ business ideas through innovations. The main goal of our team is to create a product that is able to bring you profit. We care about your success and always try to minimize all possible risks and ensure a quick turnaround.
 
Our main services include:
Business analysis
Mobile and web design
Web and mobile app development
Ongoing development and support
 
Additional services are:
Proof of concept / Technical research
Load testing
IoT hardware prototyping and software development
